nodes.documentation:
@title Organization contract handles an organization and its workers.
 * @notice The organization represents an entity that manages other contracts
        and therefore the `Organization.sol` contract holds all the keys
        required to administer the other contracts.
        This contract supports the notion of an "admin" that can act on
        behalf of the organization. When seen from the outside by consumers
        of the `OrganizationInterface`, a notion of an admin does not exist.
nodes.name: Organization

nodes.documentation: Emitted when a current owner initiates a change of ownership.
nodes.name: OwnershipTransferInitiated

nodes.documentation: Emitted when a new owner accepts the ownership transfer.
nodes.name: OwnershipTransferCompleted

nodes.documentation: Emitted whenever an owner or admin changes the address of the admin.
nodes.name: AdminAddressChanged

nodes.documentation: Emitted when a worker address was set.
nodes.name: WorkerSet

nodes.documentation: Emitted when a worker address is deleted from the contract.
nodes.name: WorkerUnset

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Only owner is allowed to call this method."

arguments.value: Only owner is allowed to call this method.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Only owner is allowed to call this method."

nodes.documentation:
onlyOwner functions can only be called from the address that is
registered as the owner.
nodes.name: onlyOwner

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Only owner and admin are allowed to call this method."

arguments.value: Only owner and admin are allowed to call this method.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Only owner and admin are allowed to call this method."

nodes.documentation:
onlyOwnerOrAdmin functions can only be called from an address that is
registered as owner or as admin.
nodes.name: onlyOwnerOrAdmin

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "The owner must not be the zero address."

arguments.value: The owner must not be the zero address.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "The owner must not be the zero address."

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Proposed owner address can't be current owner address."

arguments.value: Proposed owner address can't be current owner address.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Proposed owner address can't be current owner address."

nodes.documentation:
@notice Proposes a new owner of this contract. Ownership will not be
        transferred until the new, proposed owner accepts the proposal.
        Allows resetting of proposed owner to address(0).
     * @param _proposedOwner Proposed owner address.
     * @return success_ True on successful execution.
nodes.name: initiateOwnershipTransfer

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Caller is not proposed owner address."

arguments.value: Caller is not proposed owner address.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Caller is not proposed owner address."

nodes.name: completeOwnershipTransfer

nodes.documentation:
@notice Sets the admin address. Can only be called by owner or current
        admin. If called by the current admin, adminship is transferred
        to the given address immediately.
        It is discouraged to set the admin address to be the same as the
        address of the owner. The point of the admin is to act on behalf
        of the organization without requiring the possibly very safely
        stored owner key(s).
        Admin can be set to `address(0)` if no admin is desired.
     * @param _admin Admin address to be set.
     * @return success_ True on successful execution.
nodes.name: setAdmin

nodes.documentation:
@notice Sets worker and its expiration block height.
        Admin/Owner has the flexibility to extend/reduce worker
        expiration height. This way, a worker activation/deactivation
        can be controlled without adding/removing worker keys.
     * @param _worker Worker address to be added.
@param _expirationHeight Expiration block height of worker.
     * @return remainingBlocks_ Remaining number of blocks for which worker is
                         active.
nodes.name: setWorker
unsetWorker

nodes.documentation:
@notice Checks if an address is currently registered as the organization.
     * @dev It is an implementation detail of this contract that the admin can
     act on behalf of the organization. To the outside, an "admin"
     doesn't exist. See also the `admin` storage variable.
     * @param _organization Address to check.
     * @return isOrganization_ True if the given address represents the
                        organization. Returns false otherwise.
nodes.name: isOrganization

nodes.documentation:
@notice Checks if an address is currently registered as an active worker.
     * @param _worker Address to check.
     * @return isWorker_ True if the worker is already added and expiration
                  height is more than or equal to current block number.
                  Returns false otherwise.
nodes.name: isWorker

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Expiration height must be in the future."

arguments.value: Expiration height must be in the future.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Expiration height must be in the future."

nodes.documentation:
@notice Sets worker and its expiration block height. If the worker
        already exists, then its expiration height will be overwritten
        with the given one.
     * @param _worker Worker address to be added.
@param _expirationHeight Expiration block height of worker.
     * @return remainingBlocks_ Remaining number of blocks for which worker is
                         active.
nodes.name: setWorkerInternal

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Expiration height must be in the future."

nodes.documentation:
@notice Sets worker and its expiration block height. If the worker
        already exists, then its expiration height will be overwritten
        with the given one.
     * @param _worker Worker address to be added.
@param _expirationHeight Expiration block height of worker.
     * @return remainingBlocks_ Remaining number of blocks for which worker is
                         active.
nodes.name: setWorkerInternal

params._admin: The address that shall be registered as the admin of the              organization. Can be address(0) if no admin is desired.
params._expirationHeight: If any workers are given, this will be the                         block height at which they expire.
params._owner: The address that shall be registered as the owner of the              organization.
params._workers: An array of initial worker addresses. Can be an empty                array if no workers are desired or known at construction.

isOrganization(address).details: It is an implementation detail of this contract that the admin can     act on behalf of the organization. To the outside, an "admin"     doesn't exist. See also the `admin` storage variable.
isOrganization(address).return: isOrganization_ True if the given address represents the                        organization. Returns false otherwise.

isWorker(address).return: isWorker_ True if the worker is already added and expiration                  height is more than or equal to current block number.                  Returns false otherwise.

setWorker(address,uint256).return: remainingBlocks_ Remaining number of blocks for which worker is                         active.

unsetWorker(address).return: isUnset_ True if the worker existed else returns false.

devdoc.title: Organization contract handles an organization and its workers.

completeOwnershipTransfer().notice: Complete ownership transfer to proposed owner. Must be called by        the proposed owner.

methods.constructor: Creates a new organization. When you first initialize the        organization, you can specify owner, admin, and workers. The        owner is mandatory as it will be the only address able to make        all later changes. An admin and workers can be added at        construction or they can be set by the owner later.

initiateOwnershipTransfer(address).notice: Proposes a new owner of this contract. Ownership will not be        transferred until the new, proposed owner accepts the proposal.        Allows resetting of proposed owner to address(0).

isOrganization(address).notice: Checks if an address is currently registered as the organization.

isWorker(address).notice: Checks if an address is currently registered as an active worker.

setAdmin(address).notice: Sets the admin address. Can only be called by owner or current        admin. If called by the current admin, adminship is transferred        to the given address immediately.        It is discouraged to set the admin address to be the same as the        address of the owner. The point of the admin is to act on behalf        of the organization without requiring the possibly very safely        stored owner key(s).        Admin can be set to `address(0)` if no admin is desired.

setWorker(address,uint256).notice: Sets worker and its expiration block height.        Admin/Owner has the flexibility to extend/reduce worker        expiration height. This way, a worker activation/deactivation        can be controlled without adding/removing worker keys.

userdoc.notice: The organization represents an entity that manages other contracts        and therefore the `Organization.sol` contract holds all the keys        required to administer the other contracts.        This contract supports the notion of an "admin" that can act on        behalf of the organization. When seen from the outside by consumers        of the `OrganizationInterface`, a notion of an admin does not exist.
